title: WTB: T206 NY Highlander Polar Bear back (PSA graded preferred)
author: dictoresno

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 NY Highlander Polar Bear back (PSA graded preferred)
posts.post_content:
Trying to buy different Highlanders players with different backs before I buy repeats. These are the ones I have....

Sweet Caporal 350/25 - Frank Laporte
Piedmont 150 - Hal Chase
Piedmont 350  - Jack Knight
Sweet Caporal 150/25 - Joe Lake

Trying to find a Polar Bear, Sweet Caporal 350-460 or Sovereign back next. Looking for any Highlander (Yankee) I don't have yet preferably. Only looking for low grade, $20-45 and PSA graded preferred.

Jack Quinn, Jeff Sweeney, Red Manning, Rube Kleinow etc....
